reviewText:
Good film and good performance by two of our great funny artists in the 70's.
The story is sad but at the same time it is involved in magic and love.
Higly recommended for Latinamerican families as a good souvenir from Viruta and Capulina at their very best when they were good and true friends.
Nowadays children and young people are not interested in "marionetas" (dolls that recover life thanks to the wires) as a toys or as a visual attraction and it is a pity.
